text: @GlennKesslerWP It was and WILL BE again. Did you catch the part when he talked about Coronavirus? Did you catch the part when @SpeakerPelosi RIPPED up the State of the Union address after she mumbled through it? All Americans remember 1 1/2 months ago when economy was phenomenal.Then CHINA lied
